entries.journal_entry_description: Karl Eckener amassed a sizeable debt to both the Darkwalkers and the Skaak Tippers. Despite doing what both groups asked in exchange for payment of this debt, Karl has not been released. No more playing by their rules, it's time to rescue Karl.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the Skaak Tipper compound.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Go To the Skaak Tipper Compound
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Search both floors of the Skaak Tipper bunker for Karl Eckener.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Search Both Floors of the Skaak Tipper Bunker
entries.task02_comm_message_text: I guess Karl wasn't in the Skaak Tipper bunker. I hope that means he's in the Darkwalker cave, otherwise I don't have any idea where else to look.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: I guess Karl wasn't in one of the Skaak Tipper bunkers. I hope that means he's in the Darkwalker cave, otherwise I don't have any idea where else to look.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Karl Eckener wasn't at the Skaak Tipper compound, so hopefully you'll find him in the Darkwalker cave. Go search the cave for him.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You need three codes to release Karl from captivity. The first is held by Solon Gaw, a Darkwalker aegis guard.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Defeat Solon Gaw and get the First Code
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: The second code needed to release Karl is held by Critolus Masse, a Darkwalker underlord.
entries.task06_journal_entry_title: Defeat Critolus Masse and get the Second Code
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: The final code needed to relase Karl is in the possession of Marcus Gaw, a Darkwalker bloodlord.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Defeat Marcus Gaw and get the Third Code
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Use the prisoner constraint console and release Karl.
entries.task08_journal_entry_title: Use the Prisoner Constraint Console to Release Karl Eckener
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Speak with Karl. Make sure he is free and find out if he needs to be escorted out of the cave.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Go to Hugo Eckener and make sure he knows his son is safe.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Return to Pooja Naberrie and let her know that you've helped Hugo Eckener with his Dilemma.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Search the first floor of the Skaak Tipper bunker. The Skaak Tippers could be holding Karl Eckener anywhere within the bunker, so be thorough and search the entire floor.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: Search the second floor of the Skaak Tipper bunker. The Skaak Tippers could be holding Karl Eckener anywhere within the bunker, so be thorough and search the entire floor. You will have to use the elevator to get there.
